blog.name: sumthing-peculiar
blog.title: Something familiar~ something peculiar~
blog.description: Someone who likes all of the things. Not a lot of the things, but ALL of them.

tags: its not even just harry potter
star wars in particular also comes to mind
summary: “I wonder what unnecessary information JKR will reveal next???”
body:
“I wonder what unnecessary information JKR will reveal next???”

Trick question: there is no unnecessary info that content creators reveal about their work. Writers in particular have heaps of background info about their characters and world that aren’t in the final product that they may reveal later, like deleted scenes in movies and tv.

Y’all are just hopping on the JK Hate Train bc the information JKR reveals (mostly in direct response to questions posed by fans) doesn’t exactly match the most popular headcanon in fandom at the time (which itself keeps changing too), and as a result she must be ridiculed amiright?

I swear fandom entitlement is a hell of a thing. One misses the days where headcanons and fanfiction were actually understood to be separate from canon and online communities actually celebrated each aspect of the work (author and fan-created) instead of engaging in cyber witch hunts because content creators have the audacity to have their own views about their own work.

summary: Prije mnogo godina tri brata naiđu na duboku rijeku, punu virova. Budući da su bili vrsni čarobnjaci, oni jednim zamahom štapića...
body: Prije mnogo godina tri brata naiđu na duboku rijeku, punu virova. Budući da su bili vrsni čarobnjaci, oni jednim zamahom štapića naprave most preko rijeke. No Smrt ih pretekne, razljućena što su joj utekli, jer je ona već na toj rijeci mnoge putnike potopila. Ali, lukava Smrt napravi se da im čestita što su izbjegli njenu ruku, čak im ponudi i darove. Prvi brat, naprasite ćudi, poželi štapić koji dobiva svaki dvoboj. Smrt ga napravi od stabla bazge što je raslo pored rijeke i pokloni ga prvom bratu. Drug brat, ohole ćudi, poželi moć da otme Smrti plijen. Smrt mu dade kamen s obale, rekavši da taj kamen ima moć da vrati mrtve u život. Treći brat, najmudriji i najskromniji, poželi da može otići s tog mjesta bez da ga Smrt može slijediti. Smrt mu dade svoj Plašt nevidljivosti. Braća nastave putovanje. Prvi brat potraži u jednom selu svog neprijatelja, kojeg pozove u dvoboj. Naravno, oboružan Bazgovim štapićem, dobije dvoboj. No, te noći, nakon što se u gostionici u kojoj je trebao prenoćiti hvalio da ima nepobjedivi štapić, drugi ga čarobnjak u snu ubije te mu otme Bazgov štapić. Tako Smrt uzme prvog brata. Drugi brat se vratio u svoj dom, te pomoću kamena prizove svoju zaručnicu, što je prerano poginula. No ona je bila tužna i hladna, kao da je nekim velom odvojena od njega. Drugi brat se zato ubije kako bi istinski bio s njom u Svijetu mrtvih. Tako smrt uzme drugog brata. Trećeg brata Smrt nikada nije pronašla, te je doživio duboku starost skrivajući se pod Plaštem. Kada vidi da mu je došlo vrijeme da umre, dade Plašt svom sinu, te se mirne duše pridruži Smrti, potpuno joj ravnopravan. 🔺 | ⚫ priča o tri brata i darovi smrti, obožavam ovu priču a i Harry-a 👨❤

summary: Does Heri have a cult following? I think you mentioned how after The Worlds Worst Halloween some religious groups made her a...
question: Does Heri have a cult following? I think you mentioned how after The Worlds Worst Halloween some religious groups made her a figure of worship / a saint. After revealing she Is actually related to a God and after she Blows Him Up For Good would she eventually gather her own cult
answer: She’s had a cult since that first Halloween actually. It steadily grew larger and more reverent with every revelation. The thing about cults is that it’s not so much that they only believe in one deity, it’s that they hold a certain one in highest esteem; Maenads are followers of Dionysus, but that doesn’t mean they think Athena and the rest don’t exist, so the groups that acknowledge her as a saint/significant figure of their own religion slowly elevated her position in their reckoning as time went on as well.

reblog.comment: She’s had a cult since that first Halloween actually. It steadily grew larger and more reverent with every revelation. The thing about cults is that it’s not so much that they only believe in one deity, it’s that they hold a certain one in highest esteem; Maenads are followers of Dionysus, but that doesn’t mean they think Athena and the rest don’t exist, so the groups that acknowledge her as a saint/significant figure of their own religion slowly elevated her position in their reckoning as time went on as well.

The thing about cults is that it’s not so much that they only believe in one deity, it’s that they hold a certain one in highest esteem; Maenads are followers of Dionysus, but that doesn’t mean they think Athena and the rest don’t exist, so the groups that acknowledge her as a saint/significant figure of their own religion slowly elevated her position in their reckoning as time went on as well.

summary: Hey um whatever happened to that one teacher who was eyeing up that boy at Heri’s primary school?
question: Hey um whatever happened to that one teacher who was eyeing up that boy at Heri’s primary school?
answer: Hmm, yeah, I never addressed that did I? He never did anything to the boy, if you were worried. He never does anything to any child. I imagined him as one of those pedos that know they’re pedos and don’t act on the attraction because they know it’s wrong. Still gross, but not as bad as it could be.

summary: After Heri defeated Lord Voldyshort I assume many artists and such sought to glorify her in works. What symbols would be...
question: After Heri defeated Lord Voldyshort I assume many artists and such sought to glorify her in works. What symbols would be commonly associated with her (besides the sun) like how Athena is often drawn with owls and in armor or Dionysus with grape vines and leopard skins? What would be her iconography? Her titles? Her epithets?
answer:
Wow, I have seven more after this one. Is this all the same person?

Lol. Anyway.

I didn’t add this to the past 2 chapters since I couldn’t fit it in without forcing it (I might work it in later though), but, yeah, there’s religious art being made. There’s the sun, of course, but also the day lily in full bloom, griffins, and a small child (or numerous) trailing after and clinging to her.

As for titles and epithets, there’s ‘Martyr of Martyrs’ and ‘The Break of Day’, both from taken from chapter 13, originally said by Ernie and Neville respectively. Wizarding Britain chose ‘Girl Who Lived’ after one dude called her that in a pub after the first Halloween, so I imagine they’d eagerly coin things people called her during the battle. I also plan to work in ‘The One Who Died Yet Lives’ – it feels like something that would suit the naming convention of Wizarding Britain.

As for titles and epithets, there’s ‘Martyr of Martyrs’ and ‘The Break of Day’, both from taken from chapter 13, originally said by Ernie and Neville respectively. Wizarding Britain chose ‘Girl Who Lived’ after one dude called her that in a pub after the first Halloween, so I imagine they’d eagerly coin things people called her during the battle. I also plan to work in ‘The One Who Died Yet Lives’ – it feels like something that would suit the naming convention of Wizarding Britain.

As for titles and epithets, there’s ‘Martyr of Martyrs’ and ‘The Break of Day’, both from taken from chapter 13, originally said by Ernie and Neville respectively. blog.description: Ravenclaw. Writer. Singer. Dancer. Just Gonna Post Random Stuff.

summary:
Or yet in wise old Ravenclaw, 
if you’ve a ready mind, 
Where those of wit and learning, 
Will always find their kind.
text:
Or yet in wise old Ravenclaw,
if you’ve a ready mind,
Where those of wit and learning,
Will always find their kind.
source: J.k Rowling, Harry Potter And The Sorcerer’s Stone.

summary: Hogwarts: An RPG – A free, unofficial HP RPG!
title: Hogwarts: An RPG – A free, unofficial HP RPG!
description:
Hogwarts: An RPG is a new tabletop roleplaying game that lets you create collaborative stories in the world of the Harry Potter books & films.

Break out the dice and take on the role of a young witch or wizard attending Hogwarts! The game uses simple rules that let you get right to what’s fun about being a young witch or wizard at Hogwarts – casting spells, sneaking about after hours, testing the relationships between friends, & unraveling the mysteries of Hogwarts Castle.

The entire game is available to download for free at hwrpg.net!

reblog.comment:

summary: Overheard at the opening night party.  Person 1: So we’re NOT going to talk about Harry Potter?  Person 2: No, we’re not. We are...
body:
Overheard at the opening night party. 

Person 1: So we’re NOT going to talk about Harry Potter? 

Person 2: No, we’re not. We are most definitely not going to - Ooh, don’t even get me started on Fantastic Beasts! What the fuck, JK?! WHAT THE FUCK!!??
